title: Yulisar Khiat Buy Shares of PT Medikaloka Hermina Tbk
body: Yulisar Khiat acquired 11,274,200 shares of PT Medikaloka Hermina Tbk (HEAL.JK) at IDR 1,387 per share, totaling IDR 15,633,805,400. This investment increases Khiat's total holding from 975,554,966 to 986,829,166 shares. The transaction signifies a direct increase in ownership by a significant stakeholder.

title: Jemmy Kurniawan sells shares of PT Hetzer Medical Indonesia Tbk
body: Jemmy Kurniawan divested 7,390,000 shares of PT Hetzer Medical Indonesia Tbk (MEDS.JK). The transaction occurred on January 2, 2026, with sales prices ranging from IDR 71.0 to IDR 72.0 per share. Following the sale, Jemmy Kurniawan's holding decreased from 989,500,000 to 982,110,000 shares. This divestment represents a reduction in his stake in the company.

title: Oki Widjaja Buys Shares of PT Galva Technologies Tbk
body: Oki Widjaja acquired 138,700 shares of PT Galva Technologies Tbk (GLVA.JK) at IDR 422 per share, for a total investment of IDR 58,581,400. This transaction increases his holdings from 36,877,700 to 37,016,400 shares. The purpose is stated as investment.

title: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher buys Shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk.
body: Patrick Rudolf Dannacher acquired 1,240,500 shares of PT ITSEC Asia Tbk. (CYBR.JK) for investment purposes. The transactions occurred between December 30, 2025, and January 2, 2026, with prices ranging from IDR 1,760 to IDR 1,970 per share. Following the purchase, Dannacher's total holdings increased to 201,523,622 shares, up from 200,283,122 shares, reflecting a net increase of 1,240,500 shares.

title: Ika Kusuma Putri B Bought Shares of PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk
body: Ika Kusuma Putri B acquired 149 shares of PT Imago Mulia Persada Tbk (LFLO.JK) for investment purposes. The transaction occurred at IDR 655.0 per share. This purchase increases her stake from 0 to 149 shares, marking her initial direct ownership in the company.

title: Haryanto Sofian Buys Shares of Perdana Karya Perkasa Tbk
body: Haryanto Sofian acquired 50,000 shares of Perdana Karya Perkasa Tbk (PKPK.JK) through an investment purpose. The transactions occurred on January 2, 2026, with prices ranging from IDR 1,395 to IDR 1,400 per share. Following the purchase, Haryanto Sofian's total holdings increased by 50,000 shares to 2,149,200 shares, representing a delta of 2.38% from his previous holding of 2,099,200 shares.

title: Buana Graha Utama Buy Transaction of Multi Indocitra Tbk
body: Buana Graha Utama buy shares of Multi Indocitra Tbk (MICE.JK) at approximately IDR  570. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Dewi Irianty Wijaya Sell Transaction of PT Formosa Ingredient Factory Tbk
body: Dewi Irianty Wijaya sell shares of PT Formosa Ingredient Factory Tbk (BOBA.JK) at approximately IDR  167. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Saka Industrial Arjaya Buy Transaction of PT Mega Manunggal Property Tbk
body: Saka Industrial Arjaya buy shares of PT Mega Manunggal Property Tbk (MMLP.JK) at approximately IDR  580. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: 1 Inti Dot Com Buy Shares of PT NFC Indonesia Tbk
body: 1 Inti Dot Com acquired 7,050,000 shares of PT NFC Indonesia Tbk for IDR 12,090,750,000, at an average price of IDR 1,715 per share. This transaction increased their holding from 68,103,300 to 78,978,300 shares, representing a significant investment and an increase in their stake in the company.

title: Elang Media Visitama Buy Transaction of PT Super Bank Indonesia Tbk
body: Elang Media Visitama buy shares of PT Super Bank Indonesia Tbk (SUPA.JK) at approximately IDR  910. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Yunita Sugiarto Ew Buy Transaction of PT Formosa Ingredient Factory Tbk
body: Yunita Sugiarto Ew buy shares of PT Formosa Ingredient Factory Tbk (BOBA.JK) at approximately IDR  183. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Sumber Garam Pratama Sell Transaction of PT Multi Garam Utama Tbk
body: Sumber Garam Pratama sell shares of PT Multi Garam Utama Tbk (FOLK.JK) at approximately IDR  341. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.

title: Cakra Bhakti Para Putra Buy Transaction of PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk
body: Cakra Bhakti Para Putra buy shares of PT Steel Pipe Industry of Indonesia Tbk (ISSP.JK) at approximately IDR  424. This filing was disclosed by the exchange.
